parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Disables TI (Thermal Imaging) equipment for given vehicle.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> In older versions of Arma this command would also disable NV (Night Vision), but since Arma 3 v1.52.132676 this command disables only TI. Use [[disableNVGEquipment]] to disable NV.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[disableTIEquipment]] state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - true to turn TI off, false to turn TI on

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[disableTIEquipment]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_tank [[disableTIEquipment]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCamUseTI]], [[camUseNVG]], [[disableNVGEquipment]], [[currentVisionMode]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
